top_negative.sent: We have suffered losses, and could suffer losses in the future, when hotel owners or franchisees default on loans that we provide or fail to reimburse us for loan guarantees that we have funded.

forward_snippets: Beginning with the 2024 first quarter, we will report the following four operating segments: (1) U.S.

Our Caribbean and Latin America operating segment will not meet the applicable criteria for separate disclosure as a reportable business segment, and as such, we will include its results in “Unallocated corporate and other.” See Note 14 for more information.
Beginning with the 2024 first quarter, we will report the following four operating segments: (1) U.S.

Our Caribbean and Latin America operating segment will not meet the applicable criteria for separate disclosure as a reportable business segment, and as such, we will include its results in “Unallocated corporate and other.” See Note 14 for more information.
We believe that our brand names and other intellectual property have come to represent outstanding quality, care, service, and value to our customers, guests, and the traveling public.
